incongruent_moments.reason: The speaker's verbal content, stating "Just say anything," reflects a dismissive attitude, yet the facial expressions indicate a positive engagement with a mean face valence of 0.632, contrasting sharply with the negative audio valence of -0.125 and the mean text valence of -0.078, suggesting a dissonance between the spoken words and non-verbal cues. This divergence highlights a conflict between the text and audio modalities versus the face modality. [t: 2.1–16.8 s; text_v: -0.078; face_v: 0.632; audio_v: -0.125]

The speaker's verbal assertion, "I have a million dollars," contrasts sharply with the negative valence observed in both facial expressions (mean face valence: -0.0498) and audio tone (mean audio valence: -0.1250), indicating a dissonance between the content of the speech and the non-verbal signals. This incongruence suggests a potential lack of sincerity or confidence in the claim made during the time window of t=19.1–28.0 s. [t: 19.1–28.0 s; text_v: 0.059; face_v: -0.0498; audio_v: -0.125]
